description: Defines notification-related data structures including an enumeration for notification types and a class representing a notification with serialization, deserialization, and copy capabilities.

classes.name: NotificationType
classes.description: Enumeration of possible notification types such as reminder, alert, info, success, warning.

classes.name: AppNotification
classes.description: Class representing a notification with properties like id, title, message, type, creation time, scheduled time, read and active status, and additional data, along with methods for converting to/from a map and copying with modifications.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the AppNotification instance into a Map<String, dynamic> suitable for serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates an AppNotification instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the AppNotification with optional modifications to its properties.

methods.name: typeDisplayName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the notification type in uppercase.
